risks.name: Defense spending shortfall
risks.mechanism: Italy fails to meet NATO 2% target → capability gaps worsen → alliance burden-sharing tensions increase → strategic autonomy compromised

risks.name: Technology sovereignty erosion
risks.mechanism: Lack of investment in emerging tech → increased dependence on foreign suppliers → loss of industrial competitiveness → strategic vulnerability

risks.name: Supply chain disruption
risks.mechanism: Geopolitical tensions → semiconductor/materials shortage → defense production delays → operational readiness impact

risks.name: Cyber vulnerability
risks.mechanism: Insufficient cyber investment → critical infrastructure exposed → successful attacks → economic/security impact

risks.name: Brain drain acceleration
risks.mechanism: Limited R&D opportunities → talent emigration → innovation capacity decline → competitiveness loss

risks.name: PRC technology acquisition
risks.mechanism: Economic pressure → relaxed screening → dual-use tech transfer → military capability enhancement for adversary

nato_specific_risks.name: Mediterranean instability spillover
nato_specific_risks.mechanism: Regional conflicts → migration pressure → resource diversion from defense → NATO southern flank weakening
